entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0196.10640] umc:StockholdersEquityAdjustedBalance has a value of 8,164,648,000 and has been used with the umc:SpecialReserveMember, in the disclosure 1005 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Changes in Equity. This fact value has been used with the ComponentsOfEquityAxis and umc:SpecialReserveMember. This element should not be used to represent an opening or closing balance in the changes of equity. Please remove the member from this fact or consider using a different element to represent the opening or closing balance of umc:SpecialReserveMember. If this extension element was used to represent the changes in equity, the period type should be changed to a duration. If it represents an opening or closing balance then the element should be removed and the standard elements of either Equity or EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent should be used instead.
The properties of this umc:StockholdersEquityAdjustedBalance fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=umc:SpecialReserveMember Unit : TWD Rule Element Id:10640 Rule version: 26.0.9 - d846836d20f.htm 12633
